DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the bioequivalence of Indomethacin ER Capsules.
DOC.brief_title: A Relative Bioavailability Study of 75mg Indomethacin Extended-Release Capsules
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal findings on physical exam, medical history or clinical laboratory results on screening Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B or C No allergies to indomethacin or related drugs
